item.trans: n. 挽歌；哀悼歌 同义词:keen, elegy She threw down her basket and intoned a peasant dirge .她撂下菜篮，唱起庄稼人的哀歌。
adj. 不便的；狭窄的 同义词:narrow, confined It was very small, very dark , very ugly , very incommodious .它很窄小，很阴暗，很丑陋，很不方便。
n. 褶；辫状物 vt. 编织；把…编成辫（等于pleat）；给…打褶 同义词:pleat, pleach, complect She plaited her hair,她把辫子编了起来。
adj. 神秘的；不可理解的；不能预测的；不可思议的 同义词:mysterious, magic Atomic nuclei , in contrast , have remained far inscrutable .相对而言，对于原子核的了解就少得多了。
adj. 不可避免的；无法逃避的 同义词:inevitable, unavoidable Thyestes fell back , vomiting , and laid an ineluctable curse upon the seed of Atreus.堤厄斯忒斯向后一倒，呕吐起来；他向阿特柔斯的子孙作了必然实现的诅咒。

vt. 使垂直；探测，探索 n. 垂直；铅锤 adv. 恰恰，正；垂直地 vi. 当管子工 adj. 垂直的 同义词:detect, explore, verticalness, perpendicularity, precisely, due, vertical, perpendicular The bathyscaphe has plumbed the depth of the Indian Ocean.深海潜水器探测印度洋的深度。
n. 光泽，光彩 vi. 有光泽，发亮 vt. 使有光泽 同义词:reflet, shine, lamp, brighten up His achievements have lustred the university where he teaches.他的成就为他任教的大学添了光彩。
n. 偶像崇拜者；崇拜者；皈依者 同义词:worshiper, adorer idolater is a worshipper of idols .拜偶像的是崇拜偶像的人。

adj. 时髦的；华丽而俗气的 同义词:modern, fashionable, tony, in, stylish The brightly-coloured caps prevent accidental scratches and damage to furniture - and have the added advantage of looking snazzy .这种漂亮的指甲盖可以阻止小狗划伤家具，而且外观看起来也很华丽。
adj. 悦耳的 同义词:harmonious, musical, sweet He was enchanted with the euphonious music .他陶醉在那悦耳的音乐中。
n. 英勇；超凡技术；勇猛 同义词:valor, heroism All the while , soften her up by telling her how much you admire her dedication or analytical prowess .并且你可以通过一直告诉她你有多佩服她的付出和分析能力来让她软化。
n. 请愿人；诉愿人；（英）离婚案原告 They petitioned the government to reduce taxes.他们向政府要求减税。
adj. 严厉的，苛刻的 同义词:severe, tight, hard, harsh, rigorous In practice , though, America is unlikely to impose draconian price controls .实际上，美国不太可能实施严格的价格控制。
adj. 虚构的，假想的；想像的；虚数的 同义词:fictitious, figmentary My pet will be an imaginary duck .我的宠物会是一只虚拟的鸭子。
n. 顶峰；顶点；最高点 同义词:height, summit, sky, peak, crown The Delors Commission between 1985 and 1994 marked the zenith of this sort of integrationist zeal .1985年到1994年的德洛尔委员会标志着这种高涨的主张取消种族隔离热情的顶峰。
adj. 不同的；不相干的；全异的 n. 无法相比的东西 同义词:different, diverse, unlike, varying, another There are disparate features that tie the books together in my mind .我印象中有两点特殊性，可以将这两本书维系在一起。
n. 口是心非；表里不一；不诚实 同义词:dishonesty, perfidy The duplicity of the double-dealers reignited the hatred of the people .两面派的欺骗性重新激起人民的仇恨。
adj. 自治的；自主的；自发的 同义词:initiative, spontaneous Then it would be autonomous evolution instead of directed evolution .之后，取代定向进化的就将是自发的进化。
n. 弛张热 adj. 间歇性的；忽轻忽重的 同义词:spasmic Two good shots, remittent , drawing wool collects deep feeling .两根棒针，上上下下，牵引毛线汇成深情。
n. 新手，新来者；无经验者 同义词:rookie, freshman I guess he is a business tenderfoot .我猜想他是生意场上的新手。
vt. 驳斥；就…展开争论 vi. 争论；辩论 同义词:confute, redargue, debate, dispute about, polemize The statement of the last witness controverted the evidence of the first two.最后一个见证人的陈述反驳了前两个人的证词
vi. 生育（子女）；产生 vt. 生殖 同义词:result, breed, generate, reproduce procreating their kind生育他们的儿女
n. （犬，狼等的）尖牙；[解剖] 牙根；（毒蛇的）毒牙；尖端 vt. 灌水引动（水泵） 同义词:point, tip The wind fanged his face.风似利齿般地刮着他的脸。
n. 发光体；杰出人物；知识渊博的人 同义词:worthy, luminous body That luminary gazed earnestly at some papers before him , as if they were of the greatest concern .那个大人物一本正经地看起面前的报纸来，仿佛那些报纸是他头等关心的事情。
n. 温室 同义词:heated housing, glasshouse Today we discuss the greenhouse effect .今天我们来讨论温室效应。
n. 麦加（沙特阿拉伯一座城市）；众人渴望去的地方 HOLY】 Jerusalem and Mecca are holy cities.耶路撒冷和麦加是圣诚。

adj. 无可争辩的；无可置疑的，不可否认的；明确的 同义词:precise, decided, specific, express, explicit It is incontestable that the patent technology implementation and industrialization are low here in China .我国专利技术实施和产业化率较低，是个不争的事实。
n. [计] 列表；清单；目录 vi. 列于表上 vt. 列出；记入名单内 同义词:statement, directory, bill, content He listed all the members' names on the card.他把所有会员的名字都记在卡片上。
adj. 无形的，触摸不到的；难以理解的 同义词:invisible, discarnate Goodwill is booked as an intangible asset .商誉作为一项无形资产入账。

vi. 深入研究；刻苦用功；专心著作 同义词:swot In order to evaluate the vibration along railway correctly , it is necessary to lucubrate the dynamic response of ground bearing the moving loads of vehicle.为了正确评价轨道沿线环境的振动，有必要深入研究列车荷载作用下地基土的动力响应。
vi. 批判；非难；责备 同义词:blame for, talk to to animadvert on corruption对腐化现象进行谴责
n. 责备；耻辱 vt. 责备；申斥 同义词:blame, thumbs-down, blame for, talk to The manager reproached the new salesgirl for her carelessness.经理斥责新来的女售货员工作上粗心大意。
n. 小伙子；家伙；龟裂 vt. 使皲裂 vi. 皲裂 同义词:apple, customer, checking, egg, guy Cold weather chapped his hands.寒冷的天气冻裂了他的双手。

n. 义务；任职；责任 同义词:obligation, liability, burden, trust, blame I therefore think people 's criteria of right and wrong incumbency are very ambiguous and obscure so as to be difficult in making it clear .为此，我认为人们对所谓仁义的涵意、对对错的标准等所设下的定义及界定，都是极其含混而模糊不清的，我们也很难将之透彻的弄清楚、说分明。
n. 熟悉，精通；亲密；随便 同义词:up on, acquainted with Too much familiarity breeds contempt .太熟悉就会掉以轻心。
adj. 无可指责的；无过失的 同义词:unimpeachable, unerring Miasmas still inhabit it. It is more hypocritical than irreproachable .更恰当地说，它是伪善的，而不是无可非议的。
adj. 首位的；初次的；女主角的 vi. 初次公演；首次露面 vt. 初次公演；初次上演 n. 初次的演出；女主角 同义词:first-time, leading actress, chief actress Her film was premiered in Cannes Festival.她的影片在戛纳电影节首次放映。
n. 陪同；护航舰；护卫队；护送者 vt. 护送；陪同；为…护航 同义词:guard, accompany vt. Will you escort this young lady to the dancing party tonight ?你今晚愿意陪这位小姐去参加舞会吗?

n. 基础；根据；下层 同义词:foundation, elements, basis, base, bed Its syntax , many grammatical features , a number of phrases and the style of a typical sentence do betray an important substratum .它的句法，许多语法特点，一些短语和典型句子的风格确实透露了重要的斯拉夫语基础。
n. 崇拜；爱慕 同义词:worship, praise His dark hair slightly ruffled and his eyes full of adoration as he looked at his bride to be .他那黑黑的头发略微有点乱。看着自己的新娘，詹姆斯眼里充满了爱慕之情。
n. 兄弟姊妹；民族成员 同义词:sibship But that point is reached sooner by those who have only one sibling rival , or none at all.可是那些只有一个或根本没有同胞兄弟姐妹与之竞争财产的人会更容易达成目的。
n. 进入；入口；准许进入；入境 同义词:threshold, access, portal, admittance Typically , these devices maintain tables that map incoming frames to VLANs based on ingress ports .通常，这些设备保存这样一些表格，它们依据进端口把输入帧映射给VLAN。
adj. 受委屈的，愤愤不平的；权利受到不法侵害的 v. 侵害，伤害（aggrieve的过去分词形式）；使悲痛 同义词:indignant, attacked She was aggrieved at the insult.她因被侮辱而觉得感情上受到伤害。
adj. 规定的 同义词:specified, stated, regulation, set, stipulated The supervisor prescribed the steps in which orders must be filled out.主管规定了完成订货的步骤。
n. 衣柜；行头；全部戏装 同义词:bureau, chest of drawers However , on the way to the wardrobe .然而，在去往衣橱的路上。

adj. 合格的，合适的；符合条件的；有资格当选的 n. 合格者；适任者；有资格者 同义词:qualified, applicable, becoming, shaped, likely, acceptee For instance , to obtain additional federal assistance for unemployment insurance , states must make more workers eligible for benefits , in particular part-time workers .比如为了获得联邦额外的失业保险救助，州政府必须让更多工人——特别是兼职工人——获得更多的救济金。
vt. 表明，表示；引起 同义词:indicate, attract, produce, bid, cause He evinced great sorrow for what he had done.他对自己的所作所为深表痛心。
adj. 唐吉诃德式的；狂想家的；愚侠的 Or was he backing down from a quixotic effort that he now knows will cost him too much support back home ?还是准备放弃堂吉诃德式的努力——现在他知道，这种努力会让他在国内失去太多的支持？
adj. 钩状的；吸毒成瘾的；入迷的 v. 用钩固定；捉住（hook的过去分词） 同义词:uncinate, falcate Perhaps you can tell us how you hooked on fitness , and how it took over your life .或许你可以告诉我们你是如何沉迷于运动，以及它是如何操纵你生活的。
adj. 漠不关心的；无关紧要的；中性的，中立的 同义词:neutral, insignificant I feel indifferent whether I am comprehended or not .不管人家理解不理解我，我都觉得无所谓。
vt. 烤，烘；使干透 vi. 焦干；烤干 同义词:to roast, bake The lack of rain had parched the land.缺少雨水使土地变得干旱。
vi. 流口水；胡说 vt. 从嘴淌下；散漫地说 n. 口水；梦话，胡说 同义词:run at the mouth, slobber, horsefeathers, somniloquence The dog drooled in anticipation of his dinner.那条狗期待着狗食而口水直流。

adj. 秘传的；限于圈内人的；难懂的 同义词:complicated, elusive Juergen Lipp , who has a bookstore specializing in esoteric articles in Hamburg , Germany , likes to surround himself with angels in numerous forms .尤尔根利普在德国汉堡拥有一个专营各类深奥书籍的书店。他喜欢各种类型的天使围绕在他身边。
vt. 用巴氏法灭菌；对…进行加热杀菌 Such heating can not only improve the feed 's handling characteristics, but also may pasteurize it .加热不但能够提高料液的操作性，而且可以对其进行杀菌。
n. 五行打油诗（一种通俗幽默短诗，有五行组成，韵式为aabba） Or God will toss off limerick for your pleasure .或者上帝为了使你高兴而抛出一首五行打油诗。
vt. 赔偿；保护；使免于受罚 同义词:secure, preserve, make good to indemnify the country against the worst damage保护国家免受最大的损害
adj. 牢固的，坚实的 同义词:strong, firm, tough, stable Due to vicelike technology and sufficient self-confidence , we will never make you regret for your choice .我们以坚实的技术底蕴和充分的自信，让您在对我们的加工产品作出选择之后不生悔意。
n. 无畏；大胆 同义词:fearlessness, boldness We should learn from the tradition and innovate intrepidity .学习传统，大胆创新。
n. 虔诚；孝敬；虔诚的行为或语言 同义词:godliness, religiosity Ching Ming Festival is a way that Chinese show piety .在清明时节祭拜祖先是中国人表达孝道的方式之一。
n. [生化][药] 胰岛素 同义词:trypsin Meditation counteracts this effect of stress on insulin resistance .冥想抵消了压力导致的胰岛素阻抗。
adj. 暴乱的；狂欢的；不受约束的；放荡的；茂盛的 同义词:independent, free American schools at the time were riotous affairs .那时的美国学校比较混乱。
n. [物] 轨道，轨线；[航][军] 弹道 同义词:path, track, railway, orbit Continuing that trajectory , the markets will be in perfect synch by the end of next year .若按照这个轨道继续下去，两类市场将在明年底前达到完全同步。
adj. 总共的；粗野的；恶劣的；显而易见的 vt. 总共收入 n. 总额，总数 同义词:robust, rough, country, dirty, bush, sum, amount, total Our company grossed over four million last year.我们公司去年总收入超过四百万。
adj. 爱开玩笑的；打趣的；滑稽的 n. 开玩笑；笑话；滑稽 v. 开玩笑（jest的ing形式） 同义词:funny, jocular, joke, gaggery, kidding, chaffing Do not mind , he is jesting .别介意，他是开玩笑。

n. 逼真，貌似真实；逼真的事物 同义词:lifelikeness, photorealistic Skeptics contend the shroud is a medieval hoax or forgery - or even a devotional work of artistic verisimilitude .怀疑论者声称这块裹尸布是中世纪的愚弄或伪造物——或者是一块艺术逼真的信仰作品。

adj. 无菌的；防腐性的 n. [助剂] 防腐剂 同义词:sterile, germfree, antiseptic agent, conserving agent Use a fan or aseptic syringe to blow air into the cast to relieve itching , if necessary .必要时可用扇子或清洁的注射器将空气送入管型内以减轻瘙痒。
adj. 傲慢的；压倒一切的 v. 压住；否定；专横地对待；繁殖过度（overbear的ing形式） 同义词:assuming, arrogant With his huge body, he overbore his opponent under him dead.他用他那庞大的身躯把对手死死地压在身下。
vi. 倾斜；倚靠；倾向；依赖 adj. 瘦的；贫乏的，歉收的 vt. 使倾斜 n. 瘦肉；倾斜；倾斜度 同义词:pitch, slope, tend, affect, poor, thin, spare, slope, tilt, slope, gradient The flagpole leans to the south.旗杆向南倾斜。
adj. 根深蒂固的；确立的，不容易改的 v. 确立；保证；挖掘壕沟（entrench的过去分词） 同义词:rooted, inrooted, engaged, assured an official entrenched in office确保职位的官员
vt. 诱捕；诱入陷阱；进入罗网 同义词:trap to ensnare birds张网捕鸟
n. 螺丝刀 He was working on a camera , almost talking to it as he tightened a screw on its top with a jeweler 's screwdriver .他正在弄一架相机，用一个珠宝商用的小改锥拧紧顶盖的一个螺丝，这句话几乎是对着相机说的。
n. 先驱；前兆；预告者 vt. 预告；充做…的前驱 同义词:precursor, forerunner, preannounce, forerun The cuckoo harbingers the coming of spring.布谷鸟告知春天的到来。
adj. 过度紧张的；过度兴奋的；过分劳累的；（文体等）过于考究的 v. 工作过度；把…做过头；使过于激动（overwork的过去式和过去分词） She didn't mean to offend you ; she was overwrought .她请你，你要是不回个信儿就可能把她得罪了。
adj. 安静的，平静的；安宁的；稳定的 同义词:peaceful, pacific, quiet, calm, steady That may be one reason why the relatively tranquil north has become progressively more dangerous .这也许是阿富汗原本相对宁静的北方地区变得日益危险的原因之一。
adj. 怀恶意的；深恨的 In the past four years , Spanish politics has been characterised by a rancorous bitterness .在过去的四年中，西班牙的政坛被刻画成了仇恨与苦难的交织。
vt. 拒绝；驱逐；憎恶 n. 拒绝；击退 同义词:refuse, negative, rejection, refusal They repulsed their enemy from the shores after a long hard struggle.经过长时间的艰苦战斗，他们终于把敌人从海岸上赶走。
n. 勒索，敲诈；勒索所得之款 vt. 勒索，敲诈 同义词:extortion, chantage, shake down, shark up They tried to blackmail me (into giving them the money).他们企图向我勒索(金钱)。
n. 无盖货车；平台型铁路货车 同义词:gondola car He curls up in a flatcar and watches the sky .他在一节平板车上蜷作一团、望着夜空。
n. 邪恶；不公正 同义词:evil, wrong, wickedness That hotel is a sink of iniquity .那家旅馆是个藏污纳垢之所。
adj. 肮脏的；污秽的；猥亵的 同义词:dirty, salt, grimy I hate that damned rubber . I loathe the filthy natives .我恨这晦气的橡胶。我厌恶这些肮脏的土人。
n. 权力；权势；影响；（马的）越障能力测试 同义词:authority, rod, infection, impression, effect the puissance of the labor vote .民众选票的力量很大。
vi. 同意；赞成 n. 同意；赞成 同义词:accept, grant, agreement, yes, Ok, leave, Okay The king has assented to the new law.国王已同意新法律。
vt. 沉思；注视；思忖；预期 vi. 冥思苦想；深思熟虑 同义词:watch, behold, puzzle He stood there contemplating the stars in the sky.他站在那里凝视着天上的星星。
vt. 探索；探测；探险 vi. 探索；探测；探险 同义词:detect, probe into, probe into, search after Let us explore the possibilities for improvement.让我们探索改善的可能性。
adj. 恰当的；善于措辞的；幸福的 同义词:happy, correct, apt, blessed He looked clever and ill -a combination by no means felicitous .他相貌聪明而不健康--两者决不是幸福的征兆。

adj. 疯狂的；着魔的 同义词:crazy, mad, insane Bernhardt possessed an iron will , particularly after the birth of her son , and used her thin , pale beauty and her wits to succeed .伯恩哈特有着钢铁般的意志，尤其是在她的儿子出生后，她用自己瘦而苍白的美丽和她的智慧取得了成功。
vi. 焊接 vt. 焊接；使联接在一起 n. 焊料；接合物 同义词:weld, filler metal, jointer to solder the hull焊接船体
n. 傻瓜；劣学生 同义词:stupid, fool What a donkey , dolt and dunce !真是个笨驴，呆子，兼傻瓜！
n. 头巾；覆盖；兜帽 vt. 罩上；以头巾覆盖 同义词:coverage, headkerchief They hooded him before hanging him.在绞死他之前，他们给他戴上了面罩。
n. 霸权；领导权；盟主权 同义词:supreme Artificial evolution is the end of engineering 's hegemony .人为进化是机器霸权终结的原因。
vt. 捏造；混合而制；调合；图谋 同义词:manufacture, trump up to concoct a new dish调配一种新菜

n. 保护；庇护；支持；赞助 同义词:protection, lee, safeguard, conservation, holding Before the launch , the United States , South Korea and Japan each deployed destroyers to nearby waters equipped with Aegis anti- missile systems .在发射前，美国，韩国和日本都在附近海域布置了装备有宙斯盾反导弹系统的驱逐舰。
adj. 回归的；后退的；退化的 同义词:degenerative, vestigial This method of portrayal emphasizes both the regressive nature and the time equivalence .这种图示方法既强调了海退性质也强调了同时性。

adj. 过度的；无节制的；紊乱的 同义词:unreasonable, undue Individual incentives should reward long-term success , prevent short-termist excesses and punish inordinate risk -taking.个人激励应奖励长期成就，避免短视的过度行为，并对无节制的冒险予以惩罚。
n. 母马；母驴；月球表面阴暗部 同义词:jennet These horses breed from mare of good stock.这些马是良种母马所生。
n. 丑角；滑稽剧演员 同义词:jack-pudding, merryman He was one part blackguard, people said , and three parts buffoon .人家说他是一分流氓气，三分小丑气。
n. 污秽；肮脏；猥亵；不洁 同义词:griminess, squalidity Anyway , we don't want this kind of filth in our courtroom .不管怎么样，我们法庭不接受这种脏货。
adj. 皮下的；皮下用的 同义词:subdermal, hypodermal Disfiguring subcutaneous lesions bulge onto the surface and at intervals discharge pus.皮下损害的形象是向表面凸起，并间断地分泌出脓液。
vi. 结结巴巴地说话 n. 口吃，结巴 vt. 结结巴巴地说出 同义词:splatter, impediment, mogilalia His regrets was stuttering to me.他结结巴巴地向我道了歉。
adj. 欢闹的；非常滑稽的；喜不自禁的 同义词:frisky, riproarious I heard a hilarious story yesterday .我昨天听到一个笑死人的故事。
n. 空虚；营养不足；死气沉沉 同义词:blank, emptiness Chronic poisoning may lead to death from inanition .慢性中毒也可能由虚弱导致死亡。
adj. 疲惫不堪的，精疲力竭的 v. 重击（whack的过去分词） 同义词:beat, used-up That girl is whacked out.那个姑娘一定是疯掉了。

n. [岩] 页岩；泥板岩 同义词:clayslate OPEC surely heeds the lesson of U. S. natural gas , where high prices led to the development of shale gas , causing prices to tank.石油输出国家组织肯定的留意到美国天然气的行为，天然气的高价引起页岩气的发展，导致了价格上涨。
n. 恩人；捐助者；施主 同义词:contributor, doner Scrooge later became Tiny Tim 's benefactor .斯克路基后来成了蒂尼·蒂姆的保护人。
vt. 诽谤；中伤；轻视；贬低 同义词:lower, wrong Why is he always trying to vilify my reputation?为什么他总是想方设法毁坏我的名誉?
n. 恶心，晕船；极端的憎恶 同义词:queasiness, naupathia Nausea can be a symptom of minor or serious disorders .轻微或严重的疾病都可能出现恶心的症状。
n. 难题；装腔作势者；不易处理的事 同义词:difficult problem, conundrum In ethics , there is a poser about the difference between killing and letting die .在道德观点上，有这样的一个问题：杀害一个人和坐视不理让一个人死去有什么分别？
n. 讨价还价；争论 vt. 乱劈；乱砍 vi. 争论；乱劈 同义词:controversy, combat, cut and carve, debate, argue with They spent hours haggling over the price.他们在价格问题上争论了好几个小时。
n. 疫苗；牛痘苗 adj. 疫苗的；牛痘的 同义词:bacterin The decision to make pandemic vaccine is a gamble .制造大流行流感疫苗的决定是一次赌博。
n. 环境；周围；出身背景 同义词:context, circumstance, setting, surrounding, condition He was born in a social milieu where further education was a luxury .他生在一个受较高教育就被认为是奢侈的社会环境里。
n. 热情；狂热；灼热 同义词:passion, flame, fire, warmth, abandon His political ardor led him into many arguments .他的政治狂热使他多次卷入争论中。
n. 合子 同义词:oospore
adj. 密闭的，密封的；无懈可击的 同义词:tight, sealed Please make the fruit jar airtight .请把果酱罐密封。

adj. 过时的；退休的；老朽的 v. 退休；变陈旧（superannuate的过去分词） 同义词:ancient, retired, retired You can superannuate your boss.你可以辞掉你的老板嘛。
n. 欢喜；高兴；欢闹 同义词:joy, merriment Wine gives not light hilarity , but noisy merriment .酒不给人以轻松的欢乐，而给人以嚣嚷的狂欢。
adj. 适于耕种的；可开垦的 n. 耕地 同义词:tillable, cultivated land, tilth It is on the arable " construction " land that the latest policy offers something new .在用作建筑的非耕地方面，最新的政策倒是有些新的内容。
n. 人身攻击；诽谤 同义词:scandal, personal attack The sheer breadth of personalities who ascend to the summit shows that there is no single gene for success .那些登上顶峰的企业家有着五花八门的个性，这说明成功并不是由某一基因决定的。
vt. 使产生；造成 vi. 产生；引起 同义词:create, inflict, result, breed Pity engendered love.怜悯产生爱。
n. 芳香 同义词:sweet, balminess We emerge from the dim room back into the Carolina sun and the dry aroma of the surrounding pine forest .我们从昏暗的展览室回到北卡罗来纳的阳光下，置身于周遭松林散发的乾燥香气中。

adj. 发胀的，浮肿的；傲慢的 v. 肿胀，得意（bloat的过去时形式） 同义词:arrogant, swollen, to swell, glory in People who take the medication but continue to eat fatty foods , suffer from painfully bloated stomachs and diarrhea .服药者如果继续吃脂肪含量高的食物，就遭受胃浮肿和腹泻带来的痛苦。
adj. 易怒的 同义词:passionate, fractious Laziness makes people irascible , and Xiangzi now grew pugnacious .懒，能使人脾气大。祥子现在知道怎样对人瞪眼。

n. 润滑剂；润滑油 adj. 润滑的 同义词:sliding agent, lubricating agent, greasing Courtesy is the lubricant which oils the wheels of business .礼貌是商务巨轮的润滑油。
vt. 使和谐；使一致；以和声唱 vi. 协调；和谐；以和声唱 同义词:accord, unify, sort, cotton, concert to harmonize one's views with the new situation使某人的观点与新的情况一致
adj. 有光泽的；光辉的 同义词:shiny, wire-wove Marble handled by our building materials company is lustrous , solid and durable.本建筑材料公司的大理石，表面光泽，质地坚实，百年无损。
n. 独身者 adj. 独身的；禁欲的 同义词:stoical If guitars were women , I 'd make Charlie Sheen look like a celibate monk .如果吉他是女人的，陈冠希跟我比简真像是个禁欲的和尚。

n. 扩散，传播；[光] 漫射 同义词:circulation, propagation, proliferation, spread The development of pressure within a cell as result of the diffusion of water into it is called turgor .由于水扩散到细胞内，使一个细胞内压力上升，被称之为膨压。

n. 顶点，极点；最高点 同义词:height, summit, sky, peak, pole A baseball player usually reaches the acme of his skill before he is thirty .一个棒球运动员通常在他三十岁之前达到球技高峰。

n. [植] 块茎；隆起 同义词:mons, apophysis This is Bulbing , tuber formation , elongation .这就是球茎块茎的形成，拔节。

n. 沼泽；湿地 adj. 沼泽的；生长在沼泽地的 同义词:wetland, cienaga, palustrine, swampy Everyone , it seemed , had an idea as to what was in the marsh that dark night .似乎每个人对在那黑夜沼泽内的物体都有自己的一套看法。
n. 厉行纪律的人；严格的人 adj. 纪律的；训练的 It save time and availability to avoid tummy bug because of not disciplinarian bite and sup .既节省了时间，又有效减少饮食不规律导致胃病的发生。
n. 范例；词形变化表 同义词:exemplification Every year at around this time I hand out awards for paradigm - shifting , best -in -class management guff .每年的这个时候，我都会为一些改变人们语言范式的最胡扯管理用语颁奖。
n. 伸长；伸长率；延伸率；延长 同义词:extension, stretching Mercury reaches its greatest elongation , 22 degrees to the east of the Sun , on May 14 .水星在五月14日会到达它最大的距角--位于太阳以东22度。

n. 信条，教义 同义词:belief, teaching, doctrine, tenet, credo Many of the coalition 's liberals — including Nick Clegg , the deputy prime minister —have thought seriously about their creed .许多执政联盟内部的自由主义分子，包括副首相尼克克莱格，将自己的信条奉为圭臬。

n. 露天市场，广场；走廊 同义词:hall, passage, plaza, square, corridor Men in red walk the Santa beat at Christmastime in Piazza Vittoria .身着红色的圣诞老人在维多利亚广场进行“圣诞巡查”。

n. 药物学，药理学 同义词:psychopharmacology They say 24 -year-old Annie Le , a doctoral student in pharmacology , was last seen Tuesday at a laboratory .他们说24岁的李安妮是一名药理学系的博士研究生，人们最后一次见到她是在周二的一个实验室里。

vt. 证明，表明；显示 vi. 显示，出现 n. 载货单，货单；旅客名单 adj. 显然的，明显的；明白的 同义词:indicate, prove, demonstrate, reveal, make clear, occur, make clear, figure, offer, come out, passenger list, apparent, obvious, distinct, transparent, decided They manifested much willingness to go.他们表示很愿意去。
adj. 勤劳的；艰苦的；费劲的 同义词:tough, trying, rough Checking all the names was a slow , laborious job .核对全部名字是件既慢又费劲的事。
adj. 短小精悍的；衣冠楚楚的；整洁的；整齐的 同义词:ordered, regular, straight Humphrey was dapper and composed as usual .汉弗莱同往常一样衣着整齐，镇定自若。
n. 琐事；蛋糕；少量 vi. 开玩笑；闲混；嘲弄 vt. 浪费；虚度 同义词:cake, bit, fool, kid around, lose, spend, moon, fool away He is not a person to trifle with.他不是好惹的人；他不是可以轻慢的人。
n. 拍手者；铃舌；响板；唠唠叨叨的嘴巴 同义词:castanet, soundboard With time elapsing , the flaps collapse on the clapper 's lap .随着时间流逝，副翼在拍手者的膝盖上堆叠起来。
adj. 回响的；反射的；起回声的 同义词:reflected, catoptric a reverberant room ; reverberant booms of cannon .有回响的房间；回荡着隆隆的炮声。
n. 实体；存在；本质 同义词:presence, existence, essence, principle, texture With bees one always talks about the colony as a single entity .总是将蜜蜂这个群体作为一个单独的整体来谈论。
n. 干粮袋；背袋 He put two bottles of wine and half a cheese into haversack .他把两瓶酒和半个干酪装在粮袋里。

adj. 幻影的；幽灵的；空想的 同义词:romantic, spectral, fantastic a phantasmal presence in the room ;房间里幽灵的存在；

n. 类比；类推；类似 同义词:similarity, parallelism Of course , film and television projects are much riskier than real estate , so the analogy is deceptive .当然，电影与电视计画的风险比不动产高得多，所以这种类比不尽确实。
n. 独白；自言自语 同义词:monologue a letter- perfect rendition of the soliloquy she was word -perfect in her part .对独白的准确再现；她的角色一字不差。
adj. 蜿蜒的；弯曲的；迂回的 同义词:indirect, curve, winding In the sinuous folds of the old capitals .在古老首都那错综复杂的褶皱里。

adj. 折磨人的；繁重累人的；使人精疲力尽的 n. 惩罚；痛打 v. 累垮；惩罚（gruel的ing形式） 同义词:torturous, cat-and-mouse, punishment, rod, payment, discipline, punishing It commemorates a trek more gruelling than the tourists who gawp at it can imagine .这是为了纪念一场比那些傻望着雕塑的游客们所能想象到的更加艰难困苦的长途跋涉。
vt. 使省悟；解迷惑；释疑；矫正 同义词:cure of, castigate Let me disabuse of that foolish prejudices.让我消除那个愚蠢的偏见。
vi. 下降，衰落；倒下 n. 衰退；暴跌；消沉 vt. 使降低；使衰落；使倒下 同义词:decline, go down, recession, downturn, decline, drop suddenly slump down to the floor突然倒在地板上
n. 清唱剧；宗教剧 同义词:cantata style used in opera and oratorio , similar to recitative but having greater melodic variation.咏叙调一种用在歌剧和（宗教）清唱剧中的朗诵风格，类似于背诵，但在旋律上大不相同。

adj. 暴躁的；任性的；难以取悦的 同义词:fierce, cranky The Lazio midfielder famously provoked Beckham into launching into a petulant kick which led to the England man being sent off .这位现拉其奥的中场选手曾经因为激怒贝壳不冷静的踢了他一脚，导致英国人被罚下而出名。
adj. 乏味的；温和的；冷漠的 vt. 使…变得淡而无味；除掉…的特性 vi. 变得平淡无奇；丧失特性 同义词:pacific, distant, soft, moderate, gentle Mr Ban is said to be bland , given to platitudes , lacking charisma .据说潘基文态度温和，用陈词滥调来说，即缺乏领袖魅力。
adj. 光滑的；淫荡的；不稳定的 同义词:smooth, unstable, glossy, glabrous Is Dai lubricious concealed glasses good- looking brown still good-looking ?戴黑色隐型眼镜好看呢还是棕色的好看?。
vi. 反对；抗辩；提出异议 n. 异议；反对 同义词:represent, sit down on, opposition, exception The classmates wanted to make her the monitor,but she demurred.同班同学想推选她当班长，可是她不愿意。
n. 充满，饱满；饱食 同义词:filled with, fullness A baby vomits milk repletion .婴儿吃饱会吐奶。
adj. 中立的，中性的；中立国的；非彩色的 n. 中立国；中立者；非彩色；齿轮的空档 同义词:indifferent, litmusless, fence-sitter, mugwump The first transition , from ionized to neutral , is the best understood .第一次从游离到中性的转变，是了解得最透彻的。
adj. 空洞的，空虚的；愚蠢的 同义词:blank, foolish, stupid, vacant We rush to fill it inane talks and nervous gestures , and the silence loses its value .我们迫不及待地在沉默中加入毫无意义的对话和紧张的手势，使得沉默失去了它的价值。
vt. 贬低...的身分；举止 同义词:bear oneself, deport The official demeaned himself by accepting the bribe.这名官员因受贿而辱没自己。
n. （诗、文、曲、画等的）选集 同义词:selection, selected works He edited that anthology of poems.那本诗集由他主编。
n. 故意的伤害罪；重伤罪；蓄意的破坏 An immediate fear , across the country , is that criminal gangs may take advantage of the mayhem .在全国范围内，当前的一个恐慌是一些犯罪团体可能会利用种族混乱。
adj. 不妥协的；不让步的 n. 不妥协的人 同义词:uncompromising, no-compromise Having failed to secure his demands , his position became increasingly intransigent and unacceptable .在他的要求得不到保障的时候，他的位置变得越来越不妥当和无法令人接受。
n. [语] 词素学；构词学
vt. 消除；排除 同义词:avoid, exclude to eliminate hunger消灭饥饿现象
